trans:
Pol: This thing here can be used with everything. When filimg MaKaleeTeeRuk, they use this to mixed it with water and used it as a mosquito repellent, which can be inhaled as well.
Ann: That's right P' Naem, when we were young, I used to eat it also. My grandfather told me to mixed it with water to relieve stomach pain. But it's a misconception, I grew up and knew that it cannot be eaten because it says on the side of the bottle.
*At that moment, Pol burst out laughing, but Pol tried not to laugh, trying not to make it impolite but just do so because I am also laughing.
P' Naem: What!!
Ann: That's right, when I was young I ate it.
P' Naem: Well that's fortunate to be able to grow up.
Pol: But at Hong Kong, there is a thing that is similar to this, which can do anything and can eat also.
*My thoughts on it, damm, why did my grandfather played me. Could probably because the similar medicine in Chinese that can be consumed. I just understand because of what Pol told me.
